WARNING: Please do not edit this file manually. Such edits will be overwritten without notice. Go to http://quest.ms.mff.cuni.cz/udvalidator/cgi-bin/unidep/langspec/specify_auxiliary.pl instead.

durf.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
durf.example: En dus, in die woorde van voormalige President Mandela, “[durf] ons nie talm nie, want ons lang pad is nog nie verby nie”.
durf.exampleen: And so, in the words of former President Mandela, “we dare not linger, for our long road is not yet over”.

het.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
het.example: Toegang tot gesondheids- en onderwysgeriewe [het] verbeter.
het.exampleen: Access to health and education facilities has improved.

kan.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
kan.example: Deur saam te werk, [kan] ons meer bereik.
kan.exampleen: By working together, we can achieve more.

mag.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

moet.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
moet.example: Die Regering [moet] vinniger, harder en slimmer werk.
moet.exampleen: The Government must work faster, harder and smarter.

sal.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
sal.example: Ons langtermyn-infrastruktuurprogram [sal] ons help om vinniger te groei.
sal.exampleen: Our long-term infrastructure program will help us grow faster.

wees.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
wees.example: Laat ons altyd gereed [wees] om die polisie van inligting oor misdaadaktiwiteite te voorsien.
wees.exampleen: Let us always be ready to provide the police with information on criminal activities.

wil.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
wil.example: Ons [wil] ook grondhervornming en landbou-ondersteuningsprogramme beter integreer.
wil.exampleen: We also want to better integrate land reform and agricultural support programs.

word.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
word.example: Welvaart [word] geskep om mense se lewenskwaliteit te verbeter.
word.exampleen: Wealth is created to improve people's quality of life.

ܗܵܘܹܐ.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

كَان.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

anāku.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
anāku.example: šarru dannu šar māt Aššur šar kibrāt arba’i Šamšu kiššat nišī [anāku]
anāku.exampleen: he is the king of Assyria

ን.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

jã.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
jã.exampleen: The notebook stayed for long time in my house

otoa.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
otoa.deficient: used with the habitual or progressive aspect

tejã.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
tejã.exampleen: The notebook stayed for long time in my house
tejã.comment: May also be used as an independent verb

toa.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
toa.deficient: Used with the habitual or progressive aspect.

كَان.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
كَان.exampleen: I will not be homeless after today.

لَيس.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
لَيس.example: ب معنى آخر ان دور نا الاساسي هو العرض و [ليس] الانتقاد.
لَيس.exampleen: In another sense, our primary role is presentation, not criticism.

lùu.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

б.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
б.example: мы маглі [б] працаваць разам з вамі

бы.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
бы.example: Вядома, такі праект быў [бы] немагчымы без падтрымкі нашых партнёраў: Аліварыя і Euroradio.
бы.exampleen: Of course, such a project would be impossible without the support of our partners: Olivaria and Euroradio.

быць.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
быць.example: Пры гэтым сірыйскія прэпараты [будуць] даступныя ў беларускіх аптэках.
быць.exampleen: At the same time, Syrian drugs will be available in Belarusian pharmacies.

гэта.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
гэта.deficient: pronominal copula may be used in the present tense
гэта.example: Усе лекцыі напоўнены энерджайзерамі, з дапамогай якіх усе пазнаёмяцца паміж сабою, а кантакты ў наш час - [гэта] вельмі важна.
гэта.exampleen: All lectures are filled with energizers, with which everyone will get to know each other, and contacts nowadays are very important.

би.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
би.example: Парламентът в момента е много необективен и не [би] избрал добър президент.
би.exampleen: Parliament is currently very biased and would not elect a good president.

бивам.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of the main verb
бивам.example: Когато катализаторите се повредят - те просто [биват] сваляни.
бивам.exampleen: When the catalysts are damaged, they are simply removed.

бъда.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
бъда.example: Предполага се, че лятото ще [бъде] горещо.
бъда.exampleen: Summer is supposed to be hot.

съм.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
съм.example: Това [е] нашият общ интерес с България.
съм.exampleen: This is our common interest with Bulgaria.

ще.rule: combination of the auxiliary with a present finite form of the main verb
ще.example: В събота разкъсана облачност [ще] има в Югозападна България.
ще.exampleen: On Saturday there will be scattered clouds in Southwestern Bulgaria.

बा.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
बा.example: जरूरी ईहो बा कि जवन काम हो रहल [बा] ओकरा के कम से कम झंडावाला लोग जरूर पढ़सु ।
बा.exampleen: It is important that youth work should be done at least.

हऽ.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
हऽ.exampleen: This country is a bachelor-dominated country.

bezañ.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

бай.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
бай.exampleen: The neck has a red fox.

estar.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

haver.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
haver.example: A mi no m'[ha] escollit a dit ningú.

poder.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

saber.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
saber.exampleen: I hope you know how to take advantage of it.

ser.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ser.exampleen: The agency was as controlled as it was outdated.

ⲡⲉ.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ⲡⲉ.example: ϩⲱⲃ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲟⲛϩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲉⲛⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ [ⲛⲉ] ·
ⲡⲉ.exampleen: For everything which is manifest is light.

být.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

bývat.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
bývat.exampleen: small companies tend to be more transparent

bývávat.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
bývávat.deficient: double iterative paradigm, typically used for remote past
bývávat.exampleen: practical experience used to be part of the study before the revolution

бꙑти.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
бꙑти.exampleen: The light of the body is the eye.

bod.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

blive.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
blive.example: Rom [blev] ikke bygget på én dag.
blive.exampleen: Rome was not built in one day.

burde.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
burde.example: I de kommende år [bør] det blive lettere at hæve kvalitetsniveauet på vore højere læreranstalter.
burde.exampleen: In the coming years, it should be easier to raise the quality level at our higher education institutions.

have.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
have.example: Telefonerne [har] kimet på den lille sygestue i Brøndby.
have.exampleen: The phones have rung at the small hospital in Brøndby.

kunne.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
kunne.example: Tænk at en kommode [kan] koste 18.000 kroner.
kunne.exampleen: Imagine that a dresser can cost 18,000 kroner.

måtte.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
måtte.example: Vi [må] jo se at finde ud af det.

skulle.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
skulle.exampleen: Now I have to show the way.

turde.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
turde.exampleen: Maja does not dare look at him.

ville.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
ville.example: Det [vil] hindre mange misforståelser mellem vore to partier.
ville.exampleen: It will prevent many misunderstandings between our two parties.

være.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
være.exampleen: It is his first real theatrical role.

dürfen.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
dürfen.exampleen: Flora is allowed to use her maiden name again.

haben.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
haben.example: Ich [habe] mehrere ausprobiert und war nie richtig zufrieden.
haben.exampleen: I've tried several and was never really satisfied.

können.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
können.exampleen: He was able to repeat this success later.

mögen.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
mögen.exampleen: I would like to warn everyone here.

müssen.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
müssen.example: Bankkunden [mussten] mehrere Stunden anstehen, um Geld abzuheben.
müssen.exampleen: Bank customers had to queue for several hours to withdraw money.

sein.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

sollen.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
sollen.example: Sie [sollten] den Bienenhain vor Honigräubern schützen.
sollen.exampleen: They should protect the beehive from honey robbers.

werden.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
werden.example: Wir [werden] die Sonnendüne als Geheimtipp handeln.
werden.exampleen: We will treat the sun dune as an insider tip.

wollen.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
wollen.example: Beide [wollten] ihm bei der Suche nach ihr helfen.
wollen.exampleen: Both wanted to help him find her.

έχω.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
έχω.example: Δεν [έχουμε] συζητήσει ακόμη τη διαδικασία Lamfalussy.
έχω.exampleen: We have not yet discussed the Lamfalussy process.

είμαι.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
είμαι.example: Αυτός [είναι] ο αποκλειστικός στόχος της πρότασης αυτής.
είμαι.exampleen: That is the sole purpose of this proposal.

θα.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present indicative form of the main verb

be.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

can.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

could.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

do.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

get.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
get.example: my old bed [got] tossed in a dumpster

have.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb

may.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
may.example: it [may] be possible for them to come

might.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
might.example: prices [might] be lower in the off season

must.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

shall.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
shall.example: [shall] we censor his works as well?

should.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
should.example: I [should] have asked for a jury

will.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

would.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
would.example: this operation [would] not bring peace to the region

deber.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
deber.exampleen: We must make up lost ground.

estar.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
estar.exampleen: The world is full of ships.

haber.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
haber.exampleen: I've never been out of Trinidad.

poder.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
poder.example: También los virus [pueden] intercambiar sus ácidos nucléicos.
poder.exampleen: Viruses can also exchange their nucleic acids.

querer.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
querer.example: Vivir 12 años en Catalunya sin [querer] aprender catalán ni castellano es un menosprecio que no es preciso interpretar.
querer.exampleen: Living 12 years in Catalonia without wanting to learn Catalan or Spanish is a contempt that does not need to be interpreted.

ser.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ser.example: Y la única causa [era] el campo gravitatorio terrestre.
ser.exampleen: And the only cause was the Earth's gravitational field.

olema.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
olema.exampleen: The worst was to carry the distillery waste.

egon.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
egon.exampleen: Prisons are full of our acquaintances.

izan.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
izan.exampleen: The map on the next page may be useful to you.

ukan.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ukan.example: Familia eta gertuko komunitatea euskaldunak [dituzte] guztiz.
ukan.exampleen: The family and the nearby community are completely Basque.

است.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

olla.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
olla.exampleen: The second species was network gateway rocket.

hava.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
hava.example: Seyður [hevur] altíð havt ómetaligan týdning fyri Ísland.
hava.exampleen: Seyður has always had an invaluable significance for Iceland.

kunna.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
kunna.example: Framleiðsla av alkoholum [kann] gerast á nógvar ymiskar mátar.
kunna.exampleen: Alcohol production can take many different forms.

mega.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
mega.exampleen: Many farmers were allowed to evacuate the yard.

skula.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
skula.example: Átrúnaður [skal] miðlast við gudstænastum og møtum.
skula.exampleen: Religion should be shared with worshipers.

vera.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
vera.example: Hon [er] eisini størsta fiskivinnuhavnin í landinum.
vera.exampleen: It is by far the largest fishing port in the country.

verða.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb

avoir.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
avoir.exampleen: You have won a regular customer!

faire.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

être.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
être.example: Elles [furent] victimes de la Révolution française.
être.exampleen: They were victims of the French Revolution.

is.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
is.exampleen: He said he is not a teacher.

is.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
is.example: [An] iad a b’ fhearr na bacon?

deber.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
deber.example: As empresas [debían] crear un posto de traballo para responder curriculos.
deber.exampleen: Companies had to create a job to answer resumes.

estar.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

poder.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
poder.example: A denuncia a tempo tamén [pode] gañar unha batalla.
poder.exampleen: Timely denunciation can also win a battle.

querer.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
querer.example: Pasarán uns meses intensos moendo nos a cabeza para que interioricemos as maldades de o que [queren] atacar.
querer.exampleen: They will spend a few intense months grinding our heads so that we internalize the evils of what they want to attack.

ser.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ser.example: A súa desaparición [é] un logro europeo que defendo.
ser.exampleen: His disappearance is a European achievement that I advocate.

ter.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
ter.example: Un acaba escollendo a opción que lle parece menos mala pero nunca está moi seguro de [ter] escollido ben.
ter.exampleen: One ends up choosing the option that seems least bad to him but one is never very sure that he has chosen well.

wisan.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
wisan.exampleen: thou art in the way with him

ni.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a finite form of the main verb

ə.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a finite form of the main verb

εἰμί.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
εἰμί.example: Σαῦλος δὲ [ἦν] συνευδοκῶν τῇ ἀναιρέσει αὐτοῦ
εἰμί.exampleen: And Saul was consenting unto his death.

iko.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
iko.example: Ha'e pero roju ore ko'ape heta [roiko].
iko.exampleen: But there was a lot of people living with us.

nda'ei.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

nda'ipoi.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

ĩ.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ĩ.example: Ka'aguy heta [oĩ] upepe ro'u va'erã, heta [oĩ] va'ekue, tembi'u mi, cho'o.
ĩ.exampleen: There was a lot of forest and in it there was a lot of food, a lot of of game.

she.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

ce.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ce.deficient: used with feminine singular subjects only

ne.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ne.deficient: used with other subjects than feminine singular

היה.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

था.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
था.exampleen: The chairman of the temple committee was present.

है.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
है.example: कुशीनगर का महत्‍व महापरिनिर्वाण मंदिर से [है] ।
है.exampleen: The importance of Kushinagar is from the Mahaparinirvana temple.

ēš.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ēš.exampleen: The city of Kattitimuwa was at peace to me.

biti.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
biti.example: U Preševskoj dolini u Srbiji, Albanci [su] manjina.
biti.exampleen: In the Presevo Valley in Serbia, Albanians are a minority.

htjeti.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
htjeti.example: Novi predsjednik Moldavije usmjerit [će] se na reforme i integraciju.
htjeti.exampleen: Moldova's new president will focus on reforms and integration.

być.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
być.example: Někotři rěčespytnicy měnja, zo sumeriska rěč móhła z mongolšćinu přiwuzna [być].
być.exampleen: Some linguists mean that the Sumerian language could be related to Mongolian.

van.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

եմ.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
եմ.exampleen: Otherwise you are not a good player.

adalah.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
adalah.deficient: adalah and ialah are interchangeable but adalah is more common
adalah.example: Periode tunggu saat ini [adalah] delapan minggu.
adalah.exampleen: The current waiting period is eight weeks.

ialah.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ialah.deficient: adalah and ialah are interchangeable but ialah is less common

'ahi.rule: the auxiliary precedes the main verb, which has its first syllable reduplicated
'ahi.example: ['Ahi] gagallaw nan linalā'in mangngal hi dotag.
'ahi.exampleen: The men all crowd together in getting meat.

adi.rule: the auxiliary precedes the main verb

agguy.rule: the auxiliary precedes the main verb

gun.rule: the auxiliary precedes the main verb
gun.exampleen: He repeatedly roasted those small river fish.

geta.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a supine of the main verb
geta.exampleen: Who can stop this Australian team?

hafa.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a supine of the main verb

mega.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
mega.example: Í dag [má] sjá víðfeðmar rústir þar.
mega.exampleen: Today you can see extensive ruins there.

munu.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
munu.example: Við [munum] meta hvort og hvernig við höldum áfram í næsta hluta.
munu.exampleen: We will evaluate whether and how we proceed in the next section.

skulu.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
skulu.example: Þess í stað ákváðu þeir að Albanía [skyldi] vera undir yfirráðum Ottómana, en hafa sjálfstjórn.
skulu.exampleen: Instead, they decided that Albania should be under Ottoman rule, but have autonomy.

vera.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
vera.example: Kannski [voru] kröfur um klæðaburð of strangar.
vera.exampleen: Perhaps the dress code was too strict.

verða.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
verða.example: Rússar tilkynntu að samningum [yrði] rift í byrjun október.
verða.exampleen: Russia announced that agreements would be terminated in early October.

andare.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
andare.exampleen: The exercise is done five times.

avere.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
avere.example: Le pale gli [hanno] tranciato le gambe.
avere.exampleen: The shovels have severed his legs.

dovere.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
dovere.example: Che prezzo [dovrete] pagare a Zagabria per l'intervento?
dovere.exampleen: What price will you have to pay in Zagreb for the surgery?

essere.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
essere.exampleen: It's just a lot of confusion.

fare.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
fare.example: Queste persone sfruttano i contadini, cioè li [fanno] lavorare molto e li pagano pochissimo.
fare.exampleen: These people exploit the peasants, that is, they make them work a lot and pay them very little.

potere.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
potere.exampleen: How many passengers can a Boeing 747 carry?

sapere.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
sapere.example: Ma se uno insiste con questo ritornello, significa o che non [sa] leggere le cifre oppure non le [sa] vedere.
sapere.exampleen: But if one insists on this refrain, it means either that he cannot read the figures or he cannot see them.

stare.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present participle of the main verb
stare.exampleen: The police are investigating the incident.

venire.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb

volere.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
volere.example: [Vorrei] infine soffermar mi su un ultimo punto.
volere.exampleen: Finally, I would like to focus on one last point.

だ.rule: copula is suffixed on the non-verbal predicate

دار.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

la.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

бол.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
бол.deficient: used when the suffixed copula -e- cannot provide the corresponding form
бол.exampleen: The Eurovision Song Contest 2010 will be the 55th Eurovision Song Contest.

е.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
е.deficient: suffixed copula can provide only some forms
е.example: Халықтың үміті мен Сіздің сеніміңізді ақтай алғаныма қуанышты [мын].
е.exampleen: I am glad that I was able to live up to the expectations of the people and your trust.

bûn.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
bûn.exampleen: It was the month of April.

이라는.rule: copula is suffixed on the non-verbal predicate
이라는.exampleen: The last 6 days was the third of the 24 seasons, Gyeong-chip.

абу.rule: existential-possessive negative copula present; negative auxiliary and main verb in evidential past
абу.exampleen: There is no one else in the village like him.

быть.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
быть.deficient: Occurs in code-switching, not part of Komi system.
быть.exampleen: There were foxes, polar foxes, minks. (Sentence partially in Komi and Russian.)
быть.comment: Not a native copula for Komi, the exact method of annotation should be considered.

вӧвлывлыны.exampleen: During the festivals there have been demonstrations in the village.
вӧвлывлыны.comment: example source: Челядьдырся азбука / Надежда Логинова // Войвыв кодзув (2015. No 3)

вӧвлыны.example: Менам татшӧм мича аканьыс некор на эз [вӧвлы]!
вӧвлыны.exampleen: I haven't ever had that kind of beautiful doll.
вӧвлыны.comment: example source: Мисьтӧм акань, Кирпиченко Т., Би кинь (2013. No1)

вӧвны.comment: example source: komicorpora.ru, Viktoria Mixajlova, Jölöga

лолыны.rule: NEEDS TO BE REMOVED FROM AUX LIST
лолыны.deficient: NEEDS TO BE REMOVED FROM AUX LIST
лолыны.example: NEEDS TO BE [REMOVED] FROM AUX LIST
лолыны.exampleen: NEEDS TO BE REMOVED FROM AUX LIST
лолыны.comment: NEEDS TO BE REMOVED FROM AUX LIST

лоны.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb in evidetial past
лоны.exampleen: They will be changed for a mining furnace.

овлывлыны.example: Ӧти пу вылас [овлывлӧ] дас кык позйӧдз да унджык.
овлывлыны.exampleen: There are as many as 12 or even more nests per tree.
овлывлыны.comment: example source: Сьӧд рака / Ракин А. // Би кинь (2007. No 9)

оз.rule: combination of the auxiliary and the main verb in connegative form
оз.comment: example source: komicorpora.ru, Selivanova, A. Bi kinj

эм.exampleen: – Do you have some time to spare, Sasha?
эм.comment: example source: komicorpora.ru, Kodko, Vojvyv Kodzuv.

эмышт.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
эмышт.exampleen: — There is still a little water in the teapot.
эмышт.comment: Вежон кежлӧ том кадӧ / Петр Шахов // Войвыв кодзув (1971. No 7)

olla.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

sum.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
sum.exampleen: Reports were less than the truth.

bèdò.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

x̂ana.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
x̂ana.exampleen: Because he did not want the girl to be embarrassed.

būti.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
būti.example: Klasifikacija visuomet [yra] labai reliatyvus ir ginčytinas dalykas.
būti.exampleen: Classification is always a very relative and controversial thing.

nii.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

būt.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
būt.example: Jo pilsētā naudas nekad nevar [būt] par daudz.
būt.exampleen: Because in the city money can never be too much.

爲.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
爲.exampleen: 季任 is a place guard of country 任

असणे.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

kien.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

yè.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
yè.deficient: used with locative and nominal predicates

à.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

eku.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
eku.deficient: changes the tense of the main verb

kake.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
kake.exampleen: There is sweet-potatoe in mother's house

osunuy.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
osunuy.deficient: used to change the tense of a verb
osunuy.comment: May also be used with possessed nouns (i.e. stative verbs)

аволь.rule: combination of the auxiliary in conjunctive and the main verb in connegative form
аволь.exampleen: But I never would have started to talk...

арась.rule: existential-possessive negative copula present and past
арась.deficient: used in indicative present and past only
арась.exampleen: It is a good thing you weren't at home.

бу.rule: combination of the auxiliary with main finite verb in conjunctive mood or infinitive
бу.example: Мон а муян валт, кода [бу] ёвтамс...
бу.exampleen: I can't find words, how should it be said...

иля.rule: combination of the auxiliary and the main verb in connegative form
иля.deficient: used in negative imperative and optative
иля.example: Сонсь пистьс-килькшс эци, ансяк [иля] нузялдо, витнек тувортнэнь.
иля.exampleen: They are just pushing to get into the snares, all you have to do is to keep your traps set.

ли.rule: mainly foreign element, used in main and subordinate clauses
ли.example: Виде [ли] кияк косояк мезтькак а тейни?..
ли.exampleen: Is it true that nobody is doing anything anywhere?

савкшномс.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb
савкшномс.example: Миненек [савкшны] аволь ансяк ловномс, сави тонавтнемс сёрмадомо.
савкшномс.exampleen: Not only do we have to read, we have to learn to write as well.

савомс.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb with obl agent
савомс.exampleen: This year, even Morgo had to go along.

улемс.deficient: used in future and emphatic present only
улемс.exampleen: He would like to play, but now ...

ульнемс.rule: copula past and existential-possessive past free morpheme

эзь.rule: combination of the auxiliary in past and progressive-habitual past with main verb in connegative form
эзь.deficient: indicative past and progressive-habitual past only
эзь.example: Чокшнень перть [эзть] валгоне кельбрясто неть валтнэ.
эзь.exampleen: All evening long those words did not leave the tip of his tongue.

эрявомс.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb
эрявомс.exampleen: It takes a lot of skill to prepare the forms!

hebben.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb

kunnen.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
kunnen.example: Niemand anders dan Bin Laden [kan] dat gedaan hebben.
kunnen.exampleen: No one but bin Laden could have done that.

moeten.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
moeten.example: Ook in de Tour [moet] dat tot successen leiden.
moeten.exampleen: This should also lead to success in the Tour.

mogen.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
mogen.exampleen: You can eat as much as you want.

worden.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
worden.exampleen: The train is missed by Arie.

zijn.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

zullen.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
zullen.exampleen: When will China take over Hong Kong?

bli.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
bli.example: Forslag om dette vil [bli] fremmet før jul.
bli.exampleen: Suggestions about this will be submitted before Christmas.

burde.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
burde.example: Privat kapital og kompetanse [bør] også bidra.
burde.exampleen: Private capital and expertise should also contribute.

få.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb

ha.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
ha.example: Jeg [har] gitt fedre omsorgen i enkelte saker.
ha.exampleen: I have cared for fathers in some cases.

kunne.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
kunne.example: Da [kan] du gjøre virkelig store kupp.
kunne.exampleen: Then you can make really big bargains.

måtte.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
måtte.example: Derfor [må] vi gjennomføre en etter- og videreutdanningsreform.
måtte.exampleen: Therefore, we must implement a continuing and further education reform.

skulle.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
skulle.example: Vi [skal] ha gode velferdsordninger som gir trygghet.
skulle.exampleen: We must have good welfare schemes that provide security.

tore.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
tore.example: Etter det [torde] eg ikkje ta fleire slike initiativ.
tore.exampleen: After that, I did not dare to take more such initiatives.

tørre.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
tørre.exampleen: Why do we not dare to discuss this?

vere.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
vere.example: Mi oppgåve [er] å verna om rettane til born.
vere.exampleen: My task is to protect the rights of children.

verte.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
verte.example: Som døme [vart] nemnt tilhøvet mellom morsmål og nasjonalspråk.
verte.exampleen: As an example, the connection between mother tongue and national language was mentioned.

vilje.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
vilje.exampleen: Do you think Greece will do this?

ville.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
ville.example: Sponsorpenger [vil] gjøre kunstlivet mer uavhengig og autonomt.
ville.exampleen: Sponsorship money will make art life more independent and autonomous.

være.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
være.example: Thomassen [er] på vei til sin neste gjerning.
være.exampleen: Thomassen is on his way to his next deed.

دار.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present participle of the main verb

olla.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
olla.example: Tämä [on] kirjaine Peteras da se tuodih egläi.
olla.exampleen: This letter is from Peter and it was delivered yesterday.

бъ.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
бъ.example: А за лошадьми [б] тебе самому ехать.
бъ.exampleen: And you would have to go to the horses alone.

бы.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
бы.example: А жены [бы] ваши имели покровены главы.
бы.exampleen: And your wives would have their heads covered.

быти.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

be.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

by.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
by.exampleen: I'd love to talk to him.

bywać.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

być.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

niech.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present indicative form of the main verb

niechaj.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present indicative form of the main verb

niechby.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present indicative form of the main verb
niechby.example: [Niechby] się już wyniósł stąd, a zrobiło by się dobrze jak po wyrwaniu chorego zęba.
niechby.exampleen: Let him get out of here already, and it would be fine as if a sick tooth had been extracted.

niechże.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a present indicative form of the main verb
niechże.example: Jeśli ktoś ma jakiekolwiek jej wiersze, lub choćby wie gdzie ich szukać: błagam, [niechże] da znać paollo@free.poltronic.net będę wdzięczny do grobowej deski - jest to dla mnie bardzo ważna sprawa, proszę...
niechże.exampleen: If anyone has any of her poems, or even knows where to look for them: please let me know paollo@free.poltronic.net I will be grateful to the death - it is a very important matter for me, please ...

to.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
to.deficient: pronominal copula may be used in the present tense instead of or in addition to the verbal copula
to.comment: The word is etymologically a pronoun but the Polish LFG team insists that in its copula usage, the word lends the clause the present tense and should thus be tagged AUX.

zostawać.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of the main verb
zostawać.exampleen: Everyone is immediately summoned to Moscow.

zostać.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a passive participle of the main verb

d̪uk.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

in.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

estar.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
estar.example: Os portugueses [estão] em forma em o surf.
estar.exampleen: The Portuguese are in shape in the surf.

ser.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ser.example: Um de eles [era] seu filho, Sérgio Fioravanti.
ser.exampleen: One of them was his son, Sérgio Fioravanti.

ter.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
ter.example: Várias soluções [têm] sido propostas para contornar este obstáculo.
ter.exampleen: Several solutions have been proposed to overcome this obstacle.

be.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
be.example: İlla hani şimdi this [is] my pencil falan diye şeyler değil de daha çok so ich glaube so Fachbegriffe jetzt was sich hier drauf bezieht.
be.exampleen: Not necessarily now this is my pencil stuff, but rather so I think so technical terms now what refers to it here.

i.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
i.example: Evet birbirimize nasıl destek çıktık mesela Mathe falan da gönderiyorduk hep sizin Übung bizden önce[ydi] hep.
i.exampleen: Yes, how did we support each other? For example, we were sending Mathe or something. Your exercise was always before us.

ol.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ol.deficient: Turkish copula used in cases where the suffixed copula does not have the corresponding form
ol.example: Und ich glaube da ist es ja schon bisschen anstrengender yapmadım ben de ama çok pişman [oldum].
ol.exampleen: And I think it's a bit more strenuous but I regretted it very much.

sein.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
sein.example: Die Sache [ist] eh die eine Seite, diese Kadıköy Acil, die sagen so:
sein.exampleen: The thing is always one side, these Kadıköy Acil, they say like this:

avea.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
avea.exampleen: The mayor, the guard, the whole village came.

fi.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
fi.example: Riscul cel mai mare [este] moartea prin asfixiere.
fi.exampleen: The greatest risk is death by suffocation.

vrea.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
vrea.exampleen: The first internship will be completed in 2007.

б.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb

бы.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
бы.example: Я [бы] сказал так: хотеть не вредно.
бы.exampleen: I would say this: wanting is not harmful.

быть.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
быть.exampleen: But not everyone should be the boss.

это.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
это.example: А единый государственный экзамен - [это] разве не новация?
это.exampleen: And the unified state exam is not an innovation?

as.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
as.exampleen: There is a city called Mahilaropya in the southern country.

bhū.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
bhū.example: uktaḥ [bhavati] yaḥ pūrvam guṇavān saṁsadi na tasya vācyam nairguṇyam pratijñābhaṅgabhīruṇā.
bhū.exampleen: If one is afraid to brake a promise, he must not tell at the court the mediocrity of the one who he previously said to be endowed with qualities.

अस्.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
अस्.exampleen: There is a city called Mahilaropya in the southern country.
अस्.comment: asti dākṣiṇātye janapade mahilāropyaṁ nāma nagaram.

भू.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
भू.example: उक्तः [भवति] यः पूर्वम् गुणवान् संसदि न तस्य वाच्यम् नैर्गुण्यम् प्रतिज्ञाभङ्गभीरुणा।
भू.exampleen: If one is afraid to brake a promise, he must not tell at the court the mediocrity of the one who he previously said to be endowed with qualities.

by.rule: combination of the auxiliary, optionally the present auxiliary, and a past participle of the main verb
by.example: Chcel [by] som s tebou prebrať istú myšlienku.
by.exampleen: I would like to discuss an idea with you.

byť.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

bývať.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
bývať.exampleen: The consequences of the impact used to be just as severe.

biti.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

leat.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

feʹrttjed.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb in infinitive
feʹrttjed.example: Na teʹl âʹtte čiččâm eeʹjj [feʹrttji] leeʹd säldten ja vasta puätt mååust.
feʹrttjed.exampleen: But back then you had to be a soldier for seven years and only then come back.

i-ǥõl.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb obl:agent with transitive verbs
i-ǥõl.example: Čääʹʒʒid di muõrid di puk poʹhtte, vuäʹbbes [i-ǥõl] ni koʹst jååʹtted.
i-ǥõl.exampleen: They brought water and wood and everything, his sister was not allowed to go anywhere.

ij.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb in connegative form.
ij.example: Tõt ooumaž ceälkk, jos [ij] täätt puk väʹldded...
ij.exampleen: That person says, if he does not want to take all...

iʹlla.example: Seeʹst [jeäʹla] ǩeeʹrjteeʹjest võl ni måkam jurddi.
iʹlla.exampleen: They have no idea who wrote it.

leeʹd.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb.
leeʹd.exampleen: That service time was twenty-five years.

õlggâd.rule: combination of the auxiliary and main verb
õlggâd.example: Suʹst leäi [õlggâm] leeʹd tõn peeiʹv čååǥǥâʹttmen vuõptees,..
õlggâd.exampleen: She should have been having her hair combed the day...

jam.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
jam.example: Ishulli i Manit s'[është] pjesë e Bashkimit Evropian.
jam.exampleen: The Isle of Man is not part of the European Union.

kam.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
kam.example: Format e emërimit të qytetit [kanë] ndryshuar gjatë shekujve.
kam.exampleen: The forms of naming the city have changed over the centuries.

u.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a gerund of the main verb
u.example: Qytetet [u] shndërruan në shtete të qytetit dhe shtete kombëtare.

biti.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
biti.exampleen: Esat Berisha is one such example.

hteti.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
hteti.exampleen: This will not be the first renovation of Galeb.

ha.rule: Combines with the supine form of the main verb to form perfect and pluperfect.

vara.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
vara.example: En huvudtes i kibbutzideologin [är] fullständig jämställdhet mellan könen.
vara.exampleen: One of the main themes in the kibbutz ideology is complete equality between the sexes.

படு.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
படு.example: பன்னாட்டு தொழில் நிறுவனங்களில் தொழிற்சங்க உரிமைகள் மறுக்கப்[படுகின்றன].
படு.exampleen: Trade union rights are denied in multinational corporations.

போ.rule: follows the infinitive of the main verb
போ.example: இது போன்ற வதந்திகளுக்கு ஆக தான் பெரிதும் கவலைப்படப் [போவதி]ல்லை
போ.exampleen: I'm not going to worry too much about rumors like this

மாட்டு.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
மாட்டு.example: இந்தப் பயணத்தின் போது அவர் பாகிஸ்தானுக்குச் செல்ல [மாட்டார்] என்று வெள்ளை மாளிகை செய்திக்குறிப்பு தெரிவிக்கிறது.
மாட்டு.exampleen: The White House said in a statement that he would not go to Pakistan during the trip.
மாட்டு.comment: for negative future tense with human subject

முடி.rule: follows the infinitive of the main verb
முடி.example: இவர்களுக்க் ஆன கட்சி என்று காங்கிரசுக்கு முத்திரை குத்த [முடியாது] என்றார் ராகுல்.
முடி.exampleen: Rahul said the Congress could not be branded as a party for them.

முயல்.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
முயல்.example: ஆளும் ஐக்கிய ஜனதாதளம் - பாஜக கூட்டணிய் ஆனால் உம் சரி அல்லது ராஷ்ட்ரீய ஜனதாதளம் - லோக் ஜனசக்தி கூட்டணிய் ஆனால் உம் சரி இவை இரண்ட் உம் ஏ மத, ஜாதி அரசியலை முன்னிறுத்தி அரசியல் லாபம் அடைய [முயல்கின்றன].
முயல்.exampleen: The ruling United Janata Dal-BJP alliance is either yours or the Rashtriya Janata Dal-Lok Janashakthi alliance but you are both seeking political gain by projecting religious and caste politics.

வேண்டு.rule: follows the infinitive of the main verb
வேண்டு.exampleen: Both must be of marriageable age.

வை.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a participle of the main verb
வை.example: சாகும் வரை சிறையில் ஏயே அடைத்து [வைத்தால்] உம்
வை.exampleen: If you are imprisoned until death

huwag.rule: the auxiliary precedes the main verb

i.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
i.deficient: suffixed copula can provide only some forms
i.example: Bu hayvanların arasında en vahşisi kaplan[mış].
i.exampleen: The wildest of these animals was the tiger.

ol.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ol.deficient: used when the suffixed copula i- cannot provide the corresponding form
ol.exampleen: I didn't know everyone was here.

ئى.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ئى.deficient: suffixed copula can provide only some forms
ئى.exampleen: Our house was next door to Ara.

بول.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
بول.deficient: used when the suffixed copula cannot provide the corresponding form
بول.exampleen: Our house was next door to Ara.

б.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
б.example: Коли [б] я не прийшла надвечір, занесеш веприкові.
б.exampleen: If I don't come in the evening, you'll bring it to the boar.

би.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
би.example: А що було [би] якби не було туманностей, зірок, галактик.
би.exampleen: And what would happen if there were no nebulae, stars, galaxies.

бувати.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
бувати.exampleen: The leg is usually a barely noticeable ring.

бути.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
бути.example: Різання [є] одним з найпоширеніших способів механічної обробки конструкційних матеріалів.
бути.exampleen: Cutting is one of the most common methods of machining structural materials.

تھا.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

ہے.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ہے.example: شکیل اور پروین بیگم کی حالت تشویشناک [ہے]۔
ہے.exampleen: The condition of Shakeel and Parveen Begum is critical.

là.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
là.example: Đó [là] cuộc chiến tranh phi nghĩa.

ka.rule: combination of the auxiliary and an infinitive of the main verb
ka.exampleen: The small child is chasing the dog.

avoir.rule: combination of the auxiliary and a past participle of the main verb
avoir.example: Wante su ne woon ci nasaaran “j'[avais] dit, mais maintenant je me dédis”, mbir mi du deme noonu!
avoir.exampleen: I said but now I dedicate myself.
avoir.comment: French auxiliary avoir contained in some foreign material

di.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
di.example: Mu mujj nag [di] nguur gu dëgër.

la.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate

ngi.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ngi.deficient: used in presentative or progressive constructions

être.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
être.deficient: French copula occurs in French foreign material
être.example: Kon soo ko seetee, làkki jambuur wi ñu fi saxal ab jumtukaay la itam bu ñuy noote ak a naaxale askan wi, maanaan “c'[est] un instrument de domination et d'infantilasation aussi du peuple”!
être.exampleen: “it is also an instrument of domination and infantilization of the people”!

jẹ́.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
jẹ́.exampleen: And the evening and the morning were the third day.

ní.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
ní.exampleen: And God called the firmament Heaven.

係.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
係.deficient: this form is used in colloquial Cantonese
係.example: 剩落呢啲都[係]冇用㗎喇！
係.comment: See https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues/653 for a discussion about Chinese copulas.

為.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
為.deficient: in Cantonese, this form is used only in the high-standard variety, not in colloquial speech
為.example: 剩落呢啲都[係]冇用㗎喇！
為.comment: See https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues/653 for a discussion about Chinese copulas.

为.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
为.deficient: wei and shi should be interchangeable, this is the simplified character for wei
为.example: 最近的公交车站[为]九三五厂站。
为.exampleen: The nearest bus station is 935 Station.
为.comment: See https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues/653 for a discussion about Chinese copulas.

是.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
是.deficient: shi and wei should be interchangeable
是.example: 南京官話曾經長期[是]中國的官方語言。
是.exampleen: Nanjing Mandarin has long been the official language of China.
是.comment: See https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues/653 for a discussion about Chinese copulas.

為.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
為.deficient: wei and shi should be interchangeable, this is the traditional character for wei
為.example: 最近的公交車站[為]九三五廠站。
為.exampleen: The nearest bus station is 935 Station.
為.comment: See https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues/653 for a discussion about Chinese copulas.

yi.rule: combination of the copula and a nonverbal predicate
